languages.text: "Будь уверен{mf||а}, ваш примитивный язык причиняет нам не меньшие страдания одним своим звуком — даже переводчик не способен сгладить его грубость".

traits.locale_text: "Будь уверен{mf||а}, ваш примитивный язык причиняет нам не меньшие страдания одним своим звуком — даже переводчик не способен сгладить его грубость".

languages.text: "Rest assured, the very sound of your primitive tongue causes us as much suffering — even a translator cannot alleviate its crudeness."
languages.original_text: "Будь уверен{mf||а}, ваш примитивный язык причиняет нам не меньшие страдания одним своим звуком — даже переводчик не способен сгладить его грубость".

traits.locale_text: "Rest assured, the very sound of your primitive language causes us as much suffering — even a translator cannot alleviate its crudeness. And yet, I would prefer to continue our conversation... would you not agree, Ulrahn?"

"Rest assured, the very sound of your primitive language causes us as much suffering — even a translator cannot alleviate its crudeness. And yet, I would prefer to continue our conversation... would you not agree, Ulrahn?"
"Rest assured, the very sound of your primitive tongue causes us as much suffering — even a translator cannot alleviate its crudeness."

"Rest assured, the very sound of your primitive tongue causes us as much suffering — even a translator cannot alleviate its crudeness. And still, I would prefer to continue our conversation... would you not agree, Ulrahn?"
"Rest assured, the very sound of your primitive tongue causes us as much suffering — even a translator cannot alleviate its crudeness."
"Rest assured, the very sound of your primitive tongue causes us as much suffering — even a translator cannot alleviate its crudeness."

languages.text: “别着急，你们原始的语言也让我们同样浑身难受。哪怕是经过翻译，也无法减轻它的粗鄙程度。”
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, the very sound of your primitive tongue causes us as much suffering — even a translator cannot alleviate its crudeness."

traits.locale_text: “别着急，你们原始的语言也让我们同样浑身难受。哪怕是经过翻译，也无法减轻它的粗鄙程度。”

languages.text: 「安心しろ、お前の原始的な舌が発する音こそ我々に多くの苦難を呼び起こすのは間違いない。翻訳者でもその品の無さはマシにできぬ」
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, the very sound of your primitive tongue causes us as much suffering — even a translator cannot alleviate its crudeness."

traits.locale_text: 「安心しろ、お前の原始的な舌が発する音こそ我々に多くの苦難を呼び起こすのは間違いない。翻訳者でもその品の無さはマシにできぬ」

languages.text: "Seid versichert, dass schon der Klang Eurer primitiven Zunge uns großen Schmerz bereitet – selbst ein Übersetzer kann diese Grobheit nicht ausgleichen."
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, the very sound of your primitive tongue causes us as much suffering — even a translator cannot alleviate its crudeness."

traits.locale_text: "Seid versichert, dass schon der Klang Eurer primitiven Zunge uns großen Schmerz bereitet – selbst ein Übersetzer kann diese Grobheit nicht ausgleichen."

languages.text: « Si cela peut vous réconforter, sachez que le son de votre langage primitif écorche mes oreilles tout autant. Même un traducteur ne peut atténuer sa vulgarité. »
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, the very sound of your primitive tongue causes us as much suffering — even a translator cannot alleviate its crudeness."

traits.locale_text: « Si cela peut vous réconforter, sachez que le son de votre langage primitif écorche mes oreilles tout autant. Même un traducteur ne peut atténuer sa vulgarité. »

languages.text: «Descuida. El mero ruido que genera tu lengua primitiva nos causa un sufrimiento equivalente; ni siquiera el traductor puede aliviar su crudeza».
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, the very sound of your primitive tongue causes us as much suffering — even a translator cannot alleviate its crudeness."

traits.locale_text: «Descuida. El mero ruido que genera tu lengua primitiva nos causa un sufrimiento equivalente; ni siquiera el traductor puede aliviar su crudeza».

languages.text: "İçin rahat olsun, ilkel ağzından çıkan sesler de aynı şekilde bize eziyet çektiriyor... Tercümanların seçtiği sözler bile kabalığını dindiremiyor."
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, the very sound of your primitive tongue causes us as much suffering — even a translator cannot alleviate its crudeness."

traits.locale_text: "İçin rahat olsun, ilkel ağzından çıkan sesler de aynı şekilde bize eziyet çektiriyor... Tercümanların seçtiği sözler bile kabalığını dindiremiyor."
